Security Requirements: To satisfy the security requirements of the sensing object, the control object and the corresponding sensing control system
To guarantee the authenticity and validity of data aggregation and pre-processing, the confidentiality and reliability of network transmission, the privacy and authenticity of information exchange.
To satisfy the security management needed for operation and maintenance and the security functions required by relevant laws and regulations.
To satisfy the user's authentication, access control authority, and need to have a certain active anti-attack ability to protect the system reliability.
